Sentencas: In this study, the availability of Ni-Ba(Zr,Y)O3-delta (BZY) cermet for the anode of direct ammonia -fueled solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) is evaluated.
Titulo: Development of Ni-Ba(Zr,Y)O3 cermet anodes for direct ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this device, the anodes need to be active for the catalytic ammonia decomposition as well as the electrochemical hydrogen oxidation.
Titulo: Development of Ni-Ba(Zr,Y)O3 cermet anodes for direct ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the catalytic activity test, ammonia decomposes completely over Ni-BZY at ca.
Titulo: Development of Ni-Ba(Zr,Y)O3 cermet anodes for direct ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: 600 degrees C, while higher temperature is required to accomplish the complete decomposition over the conventional SOFC anode of Ni yttria-stabilized zirconia cermet.
Titulo: Development of Ni-Ba(Zr,Y)O3 cermet anodes for direct ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The high activity of Ni-BZY is attributed to the high basicity of BZY and the high resistance to hydrogen poisoning effect.
Titulo: Development of Ni-Ba(Zr,Y)O3 cermet anodes for direct ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical property of Ni-BZY anode is also evaluated with the anode-supported cell of Ni-BZYIBZYIPt at 600-700 degrees C with feeding ammonia or hydrogen as a fuel.
Titulo: Development of Ni-Ba(Zr,Y)O3 cermet anodes for direct ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Since the residence time of ammonia fuel in the thick Ni-BZY anode is long, the difference in the cell performance between two fuels is relatively small.
Titulo: Development of Ni-Ba(Zr,Y)O3 cermet anodes for direct ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, it is proved that the steam concentration in the fuel strongly affects the cell performance.
Titulo: Development of Ni-Ba(Zr,Y)O3 cermet anodes for direct ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: We find that this factor is important to satisfy the above mentioned requirements for the anode of direct ammonia-fueled SOFCs.
Titulo: Development of Ni-Ba(Zr,Y)O3 cermet anodes for direct ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Throughout this study, it is concluded that Ni-BZY cermet will be a promising anode.
Titulo: Development of Ni-Ba(Zr,Y)O3 cermet anodes for direct ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cells
